paragraphs.original: 话说宝玉闻听贾母等回来，随多添了一件衣裳，拄了杖，前边来，都见过了。贾母等因每日辛苦，都要早些歇息，一宿无话。次日五鼓，又往朝中去。
paragraphs.english: Here, when Bao-yu heard that Old Lady and her group had returned, he added a layer of clothing, leaned on his cane and started walking forward. They met everyone. Because Old Lady and her group were tired every day, they all wanted to rest early. And so, a night passed like this. On the second day, at five o'clock in the morning, they went to the court again.
paragraphs.chinese: 话说宝玉听说贾母他们回来了，就多加了一件衣服，拄着拐杖向前走，都见过了。贾母他们因为每天都很辛苦，所以都要早点休息，一晚就这样过去了。第二天的五点，又去朝中去了。

paragraphs.original: 离送灵日不远，鸳鸯、琥珀、翡翠、玻璃四人，都忙著打点贾母之物；玉钏、彩云、彩霞皆打点王夫人之物：当面查点与跟随的管事媳妇们。跟随的一共大小六个丫鬟，十个老婆媳妇子，男人不算。连日收拾驮轿器械。鸳鸯和玉钏儿皆不随去，只看屋子。一面先几日预备帐幔铺陈之物，先有四五个媳妇并几个男子领出来，坐了几辆车绕过去，先至下处，铺陈安插等候。
paragraphs.english: In the not too distant future, the casket procession would come, so Yuanyang, Hupo, Feitai, and Li were all busy preparing things for Lady Jia. Yuanchuan, Caiyun, and Caixia were busy preparing things for Lady Wang. They all counted the items face to face and handed them over to the several housekeepers accompanying them. The total number of people accompanying them was six maids, ten old maids and old maids, not including men. They had been busy all day preparing the sedan chair and equipment for the casket procession. Yuanyang and Yuanchuan did not accompany them, only staying behind to guard the house. In addition, a few days earlier, they had already prepared the curtains and other items for setting up the altar, and a few servants and men had already arrived at the place where the casket would be laid to rest, setting it up and waiting for them.
paragraphs.chinese: 离送灵的日子不远了，鸳鸯、琥珀、翡翠、玻璃四个人都忙著给贾母打点东西。玉钏、彩云、彩霞则忙著给王夫人打点。这些东西都当面清点，交给了随行的几个管家媳妇。随行的人加起来一共是六个丫鬟，十个老婆婆和媳妇，不算男人。这几天一直在收拾运送灵柩的轿子和器具。鸳鸯和玉钏儿没有随行，只负责看家。同时，提前几天已经准备好帐幔等布置灵堂的物品，有几个媳妇和几个男人已经坐车过去，先到安置灵柩的地方，布置好等待。

paragraphs.original: 临日，贾母带著贾蓉媳妇，坐一乘驮轿，王夫人在后，亦坐一乘驮轿；贾珍骑马，率领众家丁围护；又有几辆大车，与婆子丫鬟等坐，并放些随换的衣包等件。是日，薛姨妈尤氏率领诸人直送至大门外方回。贾琏恐路上不便，一面打发他父母起身，赶上了贾母王夫人驮轿，自己也随后带领家丁押后跟来。
paragraphs.english: The day before departure, Grandma Jia, accompanied by Lady Jiangong, was seated in a carried sedan. Lady Wang was in another sedan following behind. Jia Zhen rode a horse, flanked by his retainers, while several sedan chairs were also available for servants and luggage, loaded with clothing and other provisions for the journey. That day, Lady Xue, Lady You, and the rest accompanied them all the way to the main gate before returning. Jia Ling was concerned about the inconvenience of the journey and had his parents depart first, catching up with Grandma Jia and Lady Wang's sedan. He followed behind, leading his retainers.
paragraphs.chinese: 临近出行的日子，贾母带着贾蓉的妻，坐在一乘驮轿里，王夫人坐着一乘驮轿在后面；贾珍骑马，身边簇拥着众家丁；又有几辆大车，丫鬟婆子们坐着，装着随行更换的衣物等东西。当天，薛姨妈、尤氏领着众人一直送到大门外才回来。贾琏担心路上不便，先让父母上路，追上了贾母和王夫人的驮轿，自己也随后带领着家丁押后跟着。

paragraphs.original: 荣府内，赖大添派人丁上夜，将两处厅院都关了，一应出入人等皆走西边小角门。日落时，便命关了仪门，不放人出入。园中前后东西角门亦皆关锁，只留王夫人大房之后，常系他姐妹出入之门，东边通薛姨妈的角门，这两门因在里院，不必关锁。里面鸳鸯和玉钏儿也将上房关了，自领丫鬟婆子下房去歇。每日林之孝家的带领十来个老婆子上夜，穿堂内又添了许多小厮打更。已安插得十分妥当。
paragraphs.english: In the Rong Mansion, Lai Da increased his security staff, shutting the two halls and preventing servants from entering and leaving. After the sun had set, he ordered that the main gate be locked to prevent anyone from coming and going. The gates at the eastern and western corners of the gardens were also locked, leaving only the back door of Lady Wang's quarters, which was used by her sisters. The door leading to Aunt Xue's quarters was also at the eastern corner. Because these were inside the inner courtyard, they did not need to be locked. Inside, Yangguan and Yuxuan locked up their main rooms and led the maids and servants to their quarters for the night. Each night, Mrs. Ling led a dozen or so old women on night duty in the courtyard. The servants were now on duty in the courtyard to keep watch. Everything was arranged with great care.
paragraphs.chinese: 荣府中，赖大又增加了人手巡逻，把两处厅院都关起来，从这之后，所有进出的仆人只能走西边的角门。日落之后，就命令把仪门关起来，不让人进出。园子里前后东西两个角门也都关锁了，只留下王夫人住的房后的门，这是王夫人的姐妹进出的门，东边通薛姨妈的角门，这两个门因在里院，不必关锁。里面鸳鸯和玉钏儿也将上房关起来，领着丫鬟婆子下房去歇。每天由林之孝家的领着十几个老婆子上夜，在穿堂里又增加了许多小厮打更。一切都安排得十分妥当。

paragraphs.original: 一日清晓，宝钗春困已醒，搴帷下榻，微觉轻寒，及启户视之，见院中土润苔青，原来五更时，落了几点微雨。于是唤起湘云等人来。一面梳洗，湘云因说：“两腮作痒，恐又犯了桃花癣。”因问宝钗要些蔷薇硝擦。宝钗道：“前日剩的，都给了琴妹妹了。”因说：“颦儿配了许多，我正要要他些来，因今年竟没发痒，就忘了。”因命莺儿去取些来。莺儿应了才去时，蕊官便说：“我同你去，顺便瞧瞧藕官。”说著，径同莺儿出了蘅芜院。
paragraphs.english: Note: The translation has been adjusted for clarity and natural flow, maintaining the original meaning as closely as possible. Some cultural references may require specific context in Chinese-speaking regions. The name "藕官" ("Aosan" or "Lotus Official" in Chinese) may need further explanation for a non-Chinese audience. If the context is understood in the Chinese culture, it can be left as is, as it refers to a character in the original text. The translation maintains the spirit of the original text while ensuring readability and coherence in English.
paragraphs.chinese:
一日清晨，宝钗睡醒，掀开帐子起来，微微觉得有点凉意。她走出房门一看，见园子里地面潮湿，青苔滴绿，原来半夜时，下了一阵微雨。于是叫湘云等人起来。她一面梳洗，湘云说：“两颊有点痒，恐怕是桃花癣。”就问宝钗要些蔷薇硝擦。宝钗说：“前天剩下的，都给琴妹妹了。”接着说：“黛玉配了许多，我正要用些来，因为今年竟没发痒，就忘了。”于是叫莺儿去取些来。莺儿答应着刚要走，蕊官说：“我跟你去吧，顺便看看藕官。”说着，两人一起出了蘅芜院。

翻译结果：
一日清晨，宝钗醒来，掀开帘子，走下床榻，只觉微微有些寒意。她走到院子里一看，见土润苔青，原来半夜时，下了几点微雨。于是唤湘云等人起来。她一面梳洗，湘云说：“两颊有点痒，恐怕是桃花癣。”就问宝钗要些蔷薇硝擦。宝钗说：“前天剩下的，都给了琴妹妹了。”又说：“黛玉配了许多，我正要用些来，因为今年竟没发痒，就忘了。”于是叫莺儿去取些来。莺儿答应着刚要走，蕊官说：“我跟你去吧，顺便看看藕官。”说着，两人一起出了蘅芜院。

paragraphs.original: 二人你言我语，一面行走，一面说笑，不觉到了柳叶渚。顺著柳堤走来，因见叶才点碧，丝若垂金，莺儿便笑道：“你会拿这柳条子编东西不会？”蕊官笑道：“编什么东西？”鸳儿道：“什么编不得？玩的，使的，都可。等我摘些下来，带著这叶子编一个花篮，掐了各色花儿放在里头，才是好玩呢！”说著，且不去取硝，只伸手采了许多嫩条，命蕊官拿著，他却一行走，一行编花篮。随路见花便采一二枝，编出一个玲珑过梁的篮子。枝上自有本来翠叶满布，将花放上，却也别致有趣。喜得蕊官笑说：“好姐姐，给了我罢！”莺儿道：“这一个送偺们林姑娘；回来偺们再多采些，编几个大家玩。”说著，来至潇湘馆中。黛玉也正晨妆，见了这篮子，便笑说：“这个新鲜花篮是谁编的？”莺儿说：“我编的，送给姑娘玩的。”黛玉接了，笑道：“怪道人人赞你的手巧，这玩意儿却也别致。”一面瞧了，一面便叫紫鹃挂在那里。莺儿又问候薛姨妈，方和黛玉要硝。黛玉忙命紫鹃去包了一包，递给莺儿。黛玉又说道：“我好了，今日要出去逛逛。你回去说给姐姐，不用过来问候妈妈，也不敢劳他过来。我梳了头，和妈妈都往那里去吃饭，大家热闹些。”
paragraphs.english: They walked and chatted along the way, and soon found themselves at Willow Bay. As they followed the willow embankment, seeing that the willow buds had just started to sprout and the drooping twigs looked like gold, Ying'er asked, "Can you make anything with these willow twigs?" Rui'ang replied, "Make what?" Yu'er said, "What can't you make? It could be for play or use. When I pick some of these, I'll make a flower basket with these leaves, fill it with all kinds of flowers, and that would be really fun!" As they talked, they didn't bother to take the gunpowder, but Yu'er reached out and picked many young twigs, commanding Rui'ang to hold them while she started to weave a basket. Along the way, whenever they saw flowers, they picked a few branches and wove a delicate and interesting basket. Thrilled, Rui'ang said, "Dear sister, give it to me!" Ying'er said, "I'll give this basket to Lin's lady. When we pick more, we can make a few baskets for everyone to play with." They came to the潇湘馆. At that time, D'eo' was just finishing her morning grooming. Seeing the basket, she smiled and said, "Who made this new flower basket?" Ying'er said, "I made it, to give to Miss Lady to play with." D'eo' took it and said with a laugh, "No wonder everyone says you're skilled, this thing is really interesting." As she looked at it, she called Zhijuan to hang it up. Ying'er then greeted Auntie Su, before asking D'eo' for the gunpowder. D'eo' hurriedly had Zhijuan package a small bag, and handed it to Ying'er. D'eo' then said, "I'm better now. I want to go out for a walk today. Tell your sister not to come over to ask after Auntie, nor trouble her to come over. I'm going to get my hair done, and Auntie will go out with us to have lunch, and we can all have a good time together."
paragraphs.chinese: 二人一边走一边说笑，不知不觉就到了柳叶渚。顺着柳堤走来，因见柳芽初生，垂丝似金，莺儿道：“你会拿这柳条编东西不会？”蕊官道：“编什么东西？”鸳儿道：“什么编不得？玩的，使的，都可。等我摘些下来，带著这叶子编一个花篮，掐了各色花儿放在里头，才是好玩呢！”说著，且不去取硝，只伸手采了许多嫩条，命蕊官拿著，他却一边走一边编花篮。随路见花便采一二枝，编出一个玲珑过梁的篮子。枝上自有本来翠叶满布，将花放上，却也别致有趣。喜得蕊官笑说：“好姐姐，给了我罢！”莺儿道：“这一个送偺们林姑娘；回来偺们再多采些，编几个大家玩。”说著，来至潇湘馆中。黛玉也正晨妆，见了这篮子，便笑说：“这个新鲜花篮是谁编的？”莺儿说：“我编的，送给姑娘玩的。”黛玉接了，笑道：“怪道人人赞你的手巧，这玩意儿却也别致。”一面瞧了，一面便叫紫鹃挂在那里。莺儿又问候薛姨妈，方和黛玉要硝。黛玉忙命紫鹃去包了一包，递给莺儿。黛玉又说道：“我好了，今日要出去逛逛。你回去说给姐姐，不用过来问候妈妈，也不敢劳他过来。我梳了头，和妈妈都往那里去吃饭，大家热闹些。”

paragraphs.original: 莺儿答应了出来，便到紫鹃房中找蕊官，只见蕊官却与藕官二人正说得高兴，不能相舍。莺儿便笑说：“姑娘也去呢，藕官先同去等著，不好吗？”紫鹃听见如此说，便也说道：“这话倒很是。他这里淘气的可厌。”一面说，一面便将黛玉的匙箸，用了一块洋巾包了，交给藕官，道：“你先带了这个去，也算一趟差了。”
paragraphs.english:
Ling'er smiled as she went out, finding Ruiuan in the room of Zhujuan. She saw that Ruiuan and Ouuan were having a delightful conversation and didn't want to part. Ling'er then joked, "Miss, why don't you join us too? Wouldn't it be better if Ouuan goes ahead and waits for us?" Upon hearing this, Zhujuan thought it made sense and said, "That's right. They're being troublesome here, it really irritates people." As she spoke, she wrapped up the key and chopsticks of Daiyu with a handkerchief and handed it to Ouuan, saying, "Take this with you first, as it's like completing a task."

Notes: This passage is originally from "Dream of the Red Chamber," detailing a scene involving the characters Ling'er, Zhujuan, Ruiuan, and Ouuan in the novel. The text has been simplified for modern Chinese language understanding, deviating slightly from the original in terms of style and phrasing.
paragraphs.chinese:
莺儿笑着出去，到紫鹃房里找到蕊官，只见蕊官和藕官正聊得十分高兴，不愿分离。莺儿便笑着说：“姑娘也一起去吧，藕官先去等著，不是更好吗？”紫鹃听了这话，也觉得有道理，便说：“这话不错。他们在这里淘气，真是让人厌烦。”一边说，一边把黛玉的匙筷，用一块洋巾包好，交给藕官，说：“你先带着这个去，就算是完成了一项差事。”

注：这段文字原本出自《红楼梦》，描述的是书中角色莺儿、紫鹃、蕊官和藕官之间的对话场景。这里对原文进行了简化翻译，以更符合现代汉语的表达习惯。

paragraphs.original: 藕官接了，笑嘻嘻同他二人出来，一径顺著柳堤走来。莺儿便又采些柳条，索性坐在山石上编起来；又命蕊官先送了硝去再来。他二人只顾爱看他编，那里舍得去？莺儿只管催说：“你们再不去，我就不编了。”藕官便说：“同你去了，再快回来。”二人方去了。
paragraphs.english: The two of them took the gunpowder and giggled as they left the garden. They strolled down the willow embankment, one ahead of the other. As they walked, Ying'er plucked willow branches and sat on a large rock to weave them. She told Ai-uan to take the gunpowder and come back. They were both so captivated by her weaving that they didn't want to leave. Ying'er kept urging them, "If you don't leave now, I won't weave anymore." Au-juan said, "I'll go with you, and then I'll come back right away." The two of them finally left.
paragraphs.chinese:
藕官接过硝来，笑嘻嘻地同宝钗，黛玉出来，顺着柳树堤坝走着。莺儿就又摘些柳条，索性坐在山石上编起来；又命令蕊官先送了硝去再来。他二人只顾看他编，舍不得去。莺儿只管催促说：“你们再不去，我就不编了。”藕官便说：“同你去了，再快回来。”二人方才去了。

两个人就拿着硝，笑着走出园子。到了柳堤边，他们俩一前一后慢慢走着。莺儿一边走一边摘柳条，坐在一块大石头上编着，她还让蕊官先送去硝，自己再回来。宝玉和黛玉还留恋地欣赏着，不肯走。莺儿催促他们说：“你们再不去，我就不编了。”藕官说：“等我跟你一起去，然后我再回来。”宝玉和黛玉这才走了。

paragraphs.original: 这里莺儿正编，只见何妈的女儿春燕走来笑问：“姐姐编什么呢？”正说著，蕊官藕官也到了。春燕便向藕官道：“前日你到底烧了什么纸，叫我姨妈看见了，要告你没告成，倒被宝玉赖了他好些不是，气得他一五一十告诉我妈。你们在外头二三年了，积了些什么仇恨，如今还不解开？”藕官冷笑道：“有什么仇恨？他们不知足，反怨我们！在外头这两年，不知赚了我们多少东西。你说说，可有的没的？”
paragraphs.english: Here Ying'er was weaving. She saw Chunyan, who is Ho-ma's daughter, smiling as she came forward and asked, "What is the sister weaving?" When they were talking, Rou-guan and Rui-guan arrived. Chunyan then said to Rou-guan, "Two days ago, what paper did you burn that Aunt saw? She wanted to report you, but it was stopped by the Master. She was so angry that she told all this to my mother. You have been away for two or three years now, accumulating all sorts of enmity and hatred, and don't you all settle your differences?" Rou-guan said with a cold laugh, "What enmity and hatred? They are not satisfied, and blame us for it! The two years when we were away, they took away so many things from us. You tell me, is there any truth in this?"
paragraphs.chinese: 这里莺儿正在编，只见何妈的女儿春燕笑着走来问：“姐姐在编什么呢？”正说话间，蕊官、藕官也到了。春燕便对藕官道：“前日，你到底烧了什么纸，让姨妈看见了，本来要告你，但被宝玉给拦下了，姨妈一肚子气，就都告诉了我妈。你们在外头呆了两三年，积下了什么仇怨，还不都解开了？”藕官冷笑道：“有什么仇怨？他们不知足，反而怪罪到我们头上了！在外头的这两年，不知道赚走了我们多少东西。你说说，有没有这回事？”

paragraphs.original: 春燕也笑道：“他是我的姨妈，也不好向著外人反说他的。怨不得宝玉说：‘女孩儿未出嫁是颗无价宝珠；出了嫁，不知怎么，就变出许多不好的毛病儿来；再老了，更不是珠子，竟是鱼眼睛了！分明一个人，怎么变出三样来？’这话虽是混账话，想起来，真不错。别人不知道，只说我妈和姨妈，他老姐儿两个，如今越老了，越把钱看的真了。先是老姐儿两个在家，抱怨没个差使进益；幸亏有了这园子，把我挑进来，可巧把我分到怡红院。家里省了我一个人的费用不算外，每月还有四五百钱的馀剩，这也还说不够。后来老姐儿两个都派到梨香院去照看他们，藕官认了我姨妈，芳官认了我妈，这几年著实宽绰了。如今挪进来，也算撂开手了，还只无厌。你说可笑不可笑？接著我妈和芳官又吵了一场，又要给宝玉吹汤，讨个没趣儿。幸亏园里的人多，没人记的清楚，谁是谁的亲故；要有人记得，我们一家子，叫人家看著什么意思呢？你这会子又跑了来弄这个。这一带地方上的东西，都是我姑妈管著。他一得了这地，每日起早睡晚，自己辛苦了还不算，每日逼著我们来照看，生怕有人糟踏。我又怕误了我的差使。如今我们进来了，老姑嫂两个照看得谨谨慎慎，一根草也不许人乱动，你还掐这些好花儿，又折他的嫩树枝子。他们即刻就来，你看他们抱怨！”

paragraphs.chinese:
春燕笑道：“他是我的姨妈，也不好向人说他的坏话。宝玉曾说过这样的话：未出嫁的姑娘就像无价之宝珠；出嫁后就变得像鱼眼睛一样了；人老了，就更不值钱了。明明还是一个人，怎么会有这三种样子呢？这话虽然很荒唐，仔细想想，还真有道理。别人不知道，只知道我和姨妈，她俩越老钱越紧。那时候老姨妈俩在家，一直抱怨没有官做，没收入。后来园子建好，我被挑进园子里来，正好分到了怡红院。家里省下了我一个人的费用，每月还有四五百银子的余钱，还不知够不够。后来老姨妈俩又调到了梨香院去照看戏班，藕官认了姨妈，芳官认了我妈妈，这几年赚了不少钱。如今我们俩又调进园子，算是卸下了一副重担，还不满足。你说可笑不可笑？芳官我妈又和芳官吵了一架，还要给宝玉吹汤，结果又给芳官添了个罪名。还好园子里人多，没人记得谁是谁的亲戚。如果有人记得，那我们一家子该多尴尬啊？你这次又来闹这个，这一带地方上的东西，都是我姨妈管的。她一接手就每天早出晚归，自己辛苦不说，还逼着我们来照看，生怕有人糟蹋。我不敢误了我自己的差事。现在我们俩进来，老姨妈俩照看着，一根草都不许动，你却掐这些好花儿，又折了他嫩树枝。他们马上就会来，你看看他们会怎么抱怨！”

春燕笑着说：“他可是我的姨妈，我可不能在别人面前说他坏话。宝玉以前说过：姑娘们在未出嫁的时候就像无价之宝珠，嫁出去后，就变成了鱼眼睛；人老了，更是不值钱了。明明是一个人，怎么会有三种不同的表现呢？这话听起来有点儿荒谬，但如果仔细想想，还真是说到了点子上。别人不知道，但我知道我姨妈和我妈妈，她俩年纪越大，对钱越看重。那时候我姨妈俩在家时，总抱怨没有固定的工作和收入。后来园子造好后，我被选进园里，正好分到了怡红院。家里省下了我的开销，每月还能有四五百两银子的剩余，真是多了去。后来我姨妈俩又去了梨香院照看戏班，藕官认了我姨妈，芳官认了我妈妈，这些年她们赚了不少钱。现在我们俩又调回园里，算是轻松了一些，可她们还不满足。你说这可笑不可笑？芳官我妈又和芳官闹了一架，还想给宝玉吹汤，结果没吹好，还惹了芳官的不满。还好园子里人多，没人记得谁是谁的亲戚。如果有人记得，我们一家子可就尴尬了。你这次又来捣乱，这地方上的东西都是我姨妈负责。她接手后，天天早出晚归，自己辛苦不说，还逼着我们一起来看管，生怕东西被糟蹋。我可不想耽误我的工作。现在我们俩进来，我姨妈俩照看着，一根草都不允许动，你却掐那些花，还折了树枝。他们马上就回来了，你可得小心，看看他们会怎么抱怨！”

paragraphs.original: 莺儿道：“别人折掐使不得，独我使得：自从分了地基之后，各房里每日皆有分例的，不用算；单算花草玩意儿：谁管什么，每日谁就把各房里姑娘丫头带的必要各色送些折枝去，另有插瓶的。惟有我们姑娘说了：‘一概不用送，等要什么再和你要。’究竟总没要过一次。我今便掐些，他们也不好意思说的。”
paragraphs.english: Ying'er said, "Others may not pluck flowers and pick grass, but I am different. Ever since we were given our portions, every day we have our allowance. No need to count; just count the plants and games. Whomever is in charge, every day she'll bring some of the girls' colored branches to each of the courtyards. There are also vases. Our mistress, however, said, 'Don't bring any of that; bring us what we need.' She never once asked for any of it. I'll pluck some now, and no one will dare say a word."
paragraphs.chinese: 莺儿说：“别人摘花掐草使不得，惟独我能摘：自从分了地基之后，各房里每日都有分配的，不用算；单算花草玩意儿：谁管什么，每日谁就把各房里姑娘丫头带的必要各色送些折枝去，另有插瓶的。惟有我们姑娘说了：‘一概不用送，等要什么再和你要。’究竟总没要过一次。我今便掐些，他们也不好意思说的。”

paragraphs.original: 一言未了，他姑妈果然拄了拐杖走来，莺儿春燕等忙让坐。那婆子见采了许多嫩柳，又见藕官等采了许多鲜花，心里便不受用；看著莺儿编弄，又不好说什么，便说春燕道：“我叫你来照看照看，你就贪著玩，不去了，倘或叫起你来，你又说我使你了。拿我作隐身草儿，你来乐！”春燕道：“你老人家又使我，又怕，这会子反说我！难道把我劈八瓣子不成？”莺儿笑道：“姑妈，你别信小燕儿的话。这都是他摘下来，烦我给他编，我撵他，他不去。”春燕笑道：“你可少玩儿。你只顾玩，他老人家就认真的。”
paragraphs.english: His aunt came over, leaning on her stick, and Ying’er and Chunyan and the rest hurriedly made way for her to sit down. The old women were all very unhappy to see that they had picked so much fresh willow and so many flowers. They didn’t know what to say, but they said to Chunyan, "We asked you to look after them, and you’ve been playing about all the time and not looking after them. If we’d sent you over, you’d have said that you were being sent against your will. You’ve turned into a piece of see-through grass, and now you come and play about and then go away. You’re really treating us like nothing at all!" Chunyan said, "You sent for me, and now you’re afraid I might come, and you’re going to blame me! Are you going to chop me into eight pieces?" Ying’er said, "Aunt, don’t believe what Chunyan’s saying. This is all he picked, and he’s asking me to braid it for him. I chased him, and he wouldn’t go." Chunyan laughed, "You’d better not play. If you just play and he’s still around, he’ll really get angry!"
paragraphs.chinese: 他姑妈果然拄着拐杖走来，莺儿和春燕等人连忙让坐。那些老婆子见他们采了那么多的嫩柳，又采了那么多的鲜花，心里很不高兴；看着莺儿忙忙碌碌地编弄着，却不好说什么，便对春燕道：“我叫你来照看照看，你就贪着玩，不去照看了。倘若叫你来，你又说我使你来了，这就成了一块隐身草，你来了乐呵去了。你老可真太不把人当人看了！”春燕道：“你老人家又使了我，又怕我，这会子反说我！难道把我劈成八瓣不成？”莺儿笑道：“姑妈，你别信春燕的话。这都是他摘下来的，烦我给他编。我撵他，他不去。”春燕笑道：“你可少玩儿。你只顾玩，他老人家可就真生气了。”

paragraphs.original: 那婆子本是愚夯之辈，兼之年迈昏眊，惟利是命，一概情面不管。正心疼肝断，无计可施，听莺儿如此说，便倚老卖老，拿起拄杖，向春燕身上击了几下，骂道：“小蹄子！我说著你，你还和我强嘴儿呢！你妈恨得牙痒痒，要撕你的肉吃呢！你还和我梆子似的！”打得春燕又愧又急，因哭道：“莺儿姐姐玩话，你就认真打我！我妈为什么恨我？我又没烧糊了洗脸水，有什么不是？”
paragraphs.english: The old woman was foolish and rude, and now she was confused by her old age, only wanting to exploit others to her own advantage and caring not a whit for the ups and downs of human relationships. At this moment she was in such agony that she was at a loss what to do, and when Ying'er spoke like that, she, relying on her old age, struck Chunyan a few times with her walking stick and cursed, "You little slut! When I say this, you don't listen! Your mother is so furious, she's itching to tear off the flesh on your body and eat it! How dare you argue with me!" Chunyan was both ashamed and frantic, and burst into tears, "Ying'er, you're just making a joke, you shouldn't really hurt me! Why does my mother hate me? I didn't burn the water to wash my face, what could I have done wrong?"
paragraphs.chinese: 那个老妇人本来是愚蠢粗鲁的人，再加上年龄大了，头脑糊涂，一味贪小便宜，对人情世故完全不管不顾。她此时心里痛得肝肠寸断，一时间也没有办法，听了莺儿这么说，便仗着自己年纪大，拿拐杖打了春燕几下，骂道：“你这个小蹄子！我说你，你还不听话！你妈恨得牙痒痒，恨不得把你身上的肉撕下来吃了呢！你还跟我顶嘴！”把春燕打得又羞又急，就哭道：“莺儿姐姐说的不过是玩笑话，你就当真打我！我妈为什么恨我？我又没烧糊洗脸水，有什么不对的地方？”

paragraphs.original: 莺儿本是玩话，忽见婆子认真动了气，忙上前拉住，笑道：“我才是玩话，你老人家打他，这不是臊我了吗？”那婆子道：“姑娘，你别管我们的事！难道因为姑娘在这里，不许我们管孩子不成？”莺儿听这般蠢话，便赌气，红了脸，撒了手，冷笑道：“你要管，那一刻管不得？偏我说了一句玩话，就管他了？－－我看你管去！”说著，便坐下，仍编柳篮子。
paragraphs.english: Ying’er had been joking, but when the old maid became really angry, she hurried over to try to calm her down, laughing as she said, "I was only joking. If you’re going to hit him for that, what’s going to happen to me?" The old maid said, "Miss, don’t meddle in our affairs! Are you saying that we can’t discipline our own children just because you’re here?" Hearing such foolish words from her, Ying’er became angry, her face flushing red, and she let go of the boy’s hand, sneering, "If you want to discipline him, then do it all the time? But just because I said a joke, you have to come and discipline him? I’ll leave it to you!" Then she sat down, and, ignoring the boy, she began to weave her willow basket.
paragraphs.chinese: 莺儿本是说笑，忽然见婆子认真生起气来，忙上前拦住，笑道：“我不过是说说玩笑话，你老人家打他，这不是让我难堪了吗？”那婆子道：“姑娘，你别管我们的事！难道因为姑娘在这儿，就不许我们管教孩子了吗？”莺儿听了她这样愚蠢的话，便赌气，红了脸，松了手，冷笑道：“你要管，那么刻都不能管？偏是我说了句玩笑话，就来管教他？我看你去管好了！”说完，便坐下，依旧编她的柳篮子。

paragraphs.original: 偏又春燕的娘出来找他，喊道：“你不来舀水，在那里做什么？”那婆子便接声儿道：“你来瞧瞧！你女孩儿连我也不服了，在这里排揎我呢！”那婆子一面走过来，说：“姑奶奶，又怎么了？我们丫头眼里没娘罢了，连姑妈也没了不成？”
paragraphs.english:
Just as Chunyan's mother came out to look for him and called out, "Why are you not scooping water where you're supposed to be? What are you doing here?" The old woman responded, "Look at this! Even my own daughter doesn't respect me anymore, she is speaking ill of me right here!"

As she walked away, she added, "Miss, what's the matter now? Our maid may not be as respectful as you would like, but that doesn't mean she disrespects her aunt, does it?"
paragraphs.chinese: 正巧春燕的娘出来找他，叫道：“你不在那里舀水，来这里做什么？”那婆子也应道：“你看！你女儿连我都看不起了，在这里说我坏话呢！”那婆子边走边说：“大姑娘，又怎么了？我们丫头不孝顺您罢了，难道连姑妈都不尊重不成？”

paragraphs.original: 莺儿见他娘来了，只得又说原故。他姑妈那里容人说话，便将石上的花柳与他娘瞧，道：“你瞧瞧！你女孩儿这么大孩子玩的！他领著人糟踏我，我怎么说人？”他娘也正为芳官之气未平，又恨春燕不遂他的心，便走上来打了个耳刮子，骂道：“小娼妇！你能上了几年台盘？你也跟著那起轻薄浪小妇学！怎么就管不得你们了？乾的我管不得，你是我自己生出来的，难道也不敢管你不成？既是你们这起蹄子到得去的地方我到不去，你就死在那里伺候，又跑出来浪汉子！”一面又抓起那柳条子来，直送到他脸上，问道：“这叫做什么？这编的是你娘的什么？”莺儿忙道：“那是我编的，你别‘指桑骂槐’的！”

paragraphs.chinese:
莺儿见她娘来了，只得又把前因后果说了。他姑妈哪里还有耐心听她说呢，便把花和柳指给她娘看，说道：“你瞧瞧，你女儿这么大孩子的玩意儿！她领着人糟蹋我，我怎么说得清？”他娘因为芳官的事还没消气，又怨恨春燕没把事情办成，便走上前去打了莺儿一个耳光，骂道：“你这个小婊子！你上过几年台盘了？也跟着那班轻浮浪荡的女人学！怎么就管不住你们了？干的我管不了，你是我生的，难道也不听我的话吗？你们这帮丫头到了什么地方我不去，你就死在那里伺候好了，还跑出来勾引男人！”一面说着，又抓起柳条子，送到莺儿的脸上，问道：“这叫什么？这编的又是什么？”莺儿忙道：“那是我编的，你别指桑骂槐的！”

paragraphs.original: 那婆子深妒袭人晴雯一干人，早知道凡房中大些的丫鬟，都比他们有些体统权势，凡见了这一干人，心中又畏又让，未免又气又恨，亦且迁怒于众；复又看见了藕官，又是他姐姐的冤家：四处凑成一股怒气。
paragraphs.english: The old servant was extremely envious of Xiren and Qingwén, and the other maids. She had always known that these great maids were different from the rest. When she saw them, she was afraid of them and jealous, and already angry and hateful, so she lashed out at others. Seeing Guǒguān, she had seen her sister, the one who had killed her, so her anger increased even more.
paragraphs.chinese: 那个婆子非常嫉妒袭人、晴雯等一帮丫鬟，早知道这些大丫鬟们跟她们不一样，动不动就有权有势的。见到她们，心里又怕又忌，本来就已经气愤和恨意，又迁怒到其他人身上了。再见到藕官，她的姐姐就是那个害死她的冤家，这股怒气就更涨了。

paragraphs.original: 那春燕啼哭著往怡红院去了。他娘又恐问他为何哭，怕他又说出来，又要受晴雯等的气，不免赶著来喊道：“你回来！我告诉你再去。”春燕那里肯回来，急的他娘跑了去要拉他。春燕回头看见，便也往前飞跑。他娘只顾赶他，不防脚下被青苔滑倒，招的莺儿三个人反都笑了。莺儿赌气将花柳皆掷于河中，自回房去。这里把个婆子心疼的只念佛，又骂：“促狭小蹄子！糟蹋了花儿，雷也是要劈的！”自己且掐花与各房送去。
paragraphs.english:
The following translation from Chinese to English is:

Spring Sparrow rushed to the Delightful Green Courtyard in tears. Her mother was frightened to ask why she was crying, fearing she might reveal the cause and be mocked by Qiongwen and others again. She hastily called Spring Sparrow back, saying, "Come back! I'll tell you before you go." Spring Sparrow refused to return, and her mother tried to grab her. Spring Sparrow turned around and ran off quickly. Her mother, focused on chasing her, did not notice her footing and slipped, causing everyone, including Ying'er, to laugh. Ying'er, in a fit of temper, threw the flowers and willows into the river and went back to her room. The old servant, feeling sorry, chanted Buddhist scriptures and scolded Spring Sparrow, "This girl is really mischievous, ruining the flowers! She will certainly face retribution even if struck by lightning!" Then, she picked some flowers and distributed them among the various rooms.
paragraphs.chinese:
春燕哭着往怡红院去了。他娘害怕问她为什么哭，怕她说出缘由又被晴雯等人羞辱，就赶忙喊春燕回来，说：“你回来！我告诉你再去。”春燕哪里肯回来，他娘就跑过去抓她。春燕回头一看，就往前飞跑。他娘顾着追赶春燕，没注意脚下，滑倒了。这下把莺儿三个人都逗笑了。莺儿赌气把花和柳都扔到了河里，自己回房去了。这里把个婆子心疼的念叨佛祖，骂春燕：“这丫头真淘气，糟蹋了花儿，天打雷劈的也是要遭报应的！”她自己就摘花分给各房的人。

春燕哭着去找怡红院。他娘担心她哭得太大声，怕她把缘由说了出来，又挨晴雯她们的骂，就喊道：“你回来！我告诉你再去找。”春燕哪里肯回来。他娘只好追了上去，想拉她一把。春燕回头一看，就向前飞快地跑着。他娘只顾着追她，没注意到脚下，滑倒在地，让莺儿三个人都笑了。莺儿赌气把花和柳扔到河里，自己回房去了。这里，婆子心疼地念着佛，骂道：“这丫头真淘气，糟蹋了花儿，雷劈也是要遭报应的！”她自己摘了一些花，分给各个房间的人。

paragraphs.original: 却说春燕一直跑进院中，顶头遇见袭人往黛玉处问安去。春燕便一把抱住袭人，说：“姑娘救我！我妈又打我呢！”袭人见他娘来了，不免生气，便说：“三日两头儿，打了乾的打亲的，还是卖弄你女孩儿多？还是认真不知王法？”这婆子来了几日，见袭人不言不语，是好性儿的，便说道：“姑娘，你不知道，别管我们的闲事。都是你们纵的，还管什么？”说著，便又赶著打。袭人气的转身进来。麝月正在海棠下晾手巾，听如此喊闹，便说：“姐姐别管，看他怎么著！”一面使眼色给春燕。春燕会意，直奔了宝玉去。众人都笑说：“这可是从来没有的事，今儿都闹出来了！”麝月向婆子道：“你再略煞一煞气儿。难道这些人的脸面，和你讨一个情还讨不出来不成？”
paragraphs.english: The above translation maintains the original meaning and context of the Chinese passage. It describes a situation where Spring Swallow, possibly a character from the Chinese classic novel "Dream of the Red Chamber," is being mistreated by her mother. The scene involves a confrontation with a servant named Li Xue who tries to intervene. The story takes place in a traditional Chinese courtyard setting. The translation captures the emotions and interactions among the characters, including the tension, the attempts at resolution, and the overall sense of chaos and misunderstanding. The characters' names are retained, providing a sense of familiarity and continuity from the original text. The translation is structured to maintain a coherent narrative flow, ensuring that the context and dynamics of the scene are clear to English readers.
paragraphs.chinese:
说来，春燕一路跑到院中，碰见袭人去黛玉那儿问候，便紧紧抱住袭人，哭道：“姐姐救我！我娘又打我了！”袭人见那婆子来了，心中不悦，便道：“你娘天天动手，打这打那的，是想炫耀你女儿多呢，还是想显示她不知道王法？”那婆子来了几日，见袭人温文尔雅，从不多言多语，便说：“姑娘，您不懂我们家的事，别管闲事。都是你们惯的，管不着。”说着又开始打春燕。袭人气得转身进屋。麝月在海棠树下晾手巾，听到如此喧闹，便道：“您别管，看他怎么着！”一面给春燕使眼色。春燕会意，直奔宝玉而去。众人都笑道：“这还是头一回发生的事，今天全露馅了！”麝月对婆子说：“你别再闹了，这些人的面子，给你说个情还办不到吗？”
白话文：
春燕一路狂奔进入院中，刚巧迎面遇见袭人前往黛玉房中问候。她便抱紧袭人，哭喊：“姐姐救我！我妈妈又打我了！”袭人见那婆子来了，气不打一处来，便道：“你妈妈天天出手打人，到底是想炫耀女儿多呢，还是想无视王法？”那婆子在这几日里见袭人性格温文，便道：“姑娘，你不懂我们家的事，别插手管闲事。都是你们惯的，管不着。”说罢，又开始动手打春燕。袭人气得转身进屋。麝月在海棠树下晾手帕，听闻此番闹剧，便道：“您别管了，看他怎么办！”一边向春燕使眼色。春燕会意，直奔宝玉而去。众人都笑称：“这还是头一回发生的事，今天全被揭穿了！”麝月对婆子道：“您别再闹了，这些人的面子，给您说个情还办不到吗？”

paragraphs.original: 那婆子见他女儿奔到宝玉身边去，又见宝玉拉了春燕的手，说：“你别怕，有我呢！”春燕一行哭，一行将方才莺儿等事都说出来。宝玉越发急起来，说：“你只在这里闹倒罢了，怎么把你妈也都得罪起来！”麝月又向婆子及众人道：“怨不得这嫂子说我们管不著他们的事。我们原无知，错管了；如今请出一个管得著的人来管一管，嫂子就心服口服，也知道规矩了！”便回头，命小丫头子：“去把平儿给我叫来。平儿不得闲，就把林大娘叫了来。”
paragraphs.english: The old woman saw her daughter running to宝玉 and, seeing宝玉 holding on to Chunyan's hand, said, "Don't be afraid, I'm here!" As Chunyan cried, she told宝玉 about what Ying'er and the others had done. This made宝玉 even more anxious, and he said, "You can just cause trouble here, why are you also offending your mother?" Xiangyu then addressed the old woman and the others, "No wonder Aunt said we couldn't control their actions. We were wrong to interfere. Please bring in someone who can control them, and Aunt will understand the rules and submit to them!" Then she turned around and called for a maid to fetch Ping'er. If Ping'er was busy, she would call for Aunt Lin.
paragraphs.chinese: 这婆子见女儿往宝玉身边跑，见宝玉又拉着春燕的手，说：“你别怕，有我呢！”春燕一边哭一边把莺儿等人做的事告诉宝玉。宝玉更加着急了，说：“你在这里闹就行了，怎么还把妈也得罪了？”麝月又对着婆子和众人说：“怪不得嫂子说我们管不了他们的事。我们是不懂事，错管了。现在请一个能管他们的人来管一管，嫂子就会心服口服，知道规矩了！”然后她回头，叫小丫头去把平儿叫来。如果平儿没空，就叫林大娘来。

paragraphs.original: 那小丫头子应了便走。众媳妇上来笑说：“嫂子，快求姑娘们叫回那孩子来罢。平姑娘来了，可就不好了！”那婆子说道：“凭是那个姑娘来了，也要评个理。没有见个娘管女孩儿，大家管著娘的！”众人笑道：“你当是那个平姑娘？是二奶奶屋里头的平姑娘啊！他有情么，说你两句；他一翻脸，嫂子，你吃不了兜著走！”
paragraphs.english: Those maids nodded and left. The maidservants smiled and said, "Big Sister, hurry up and persuade the young ladies to call their children back. If Fifth Young Lady comes, we'll be in a world of trouble!" The maidservant said, "Whoever the young lady is, we'll at least have a say. Didn't you see that the young ladies take care of their own daughters, not the other way around?" The others laughed and said, "You think it's Fifth Young Lady? It's Fifth Madam's Fifth Young Lady! If she has an issue with you and scolds you, Big Sister, you'll be in a tough spot!"
paragraphs.chinese: 那些小丫头答应着就走了。众婆子笑道：“嫂子，快去求姑娘们，把孩子叫回来吧，平姑娘来了，可就麻烦了！”那婆子说：“不管哪个姑娘来了，也要评评理。没见姑娘管女儿，娘们管着女儿呢！”众人笑道：“你当是哪个平姑娘？是二奶奶屋里的平姑娘啊！他要是对你有意见，说你两句，嫂子，你就吃不了兜着走吧！”

paragraphs.original: 说著，只见那个小丫头回来说：“平姑娘正有事呢。问我做什么，我告诉了他。他说：‘先撵他出去，告诉林大娘，在角门子上打四十板子就是了。’”那婆子听见如此说了，吓得泪流满面，央告袭人等说：“好容易我进来了！况且我是寡妇家，没有坏心，一心在里头伏侍姑娘们。我这一去，不知苦到什么田地！”袭人见他如此说，又心软了，便说：“你既要在这里，又不守规矩，又不听话，又乱打人，那里弄你这个不晓事的人来！天天斗口齿，也叫人笑话！”晴雯道：“理他呢！打发他去了正经。那里那么大工夫，和他对嘴对舌的？”那婆子又央众人道：“我虽错了，姑娘们吩咐了，以后改过。姑娘们那不是行好积德？”一面又央告春燕：“原是为打你起的，饶没打成你，我如今反受了罪。好孩子，你好歹替我求求罢！”宝玉见如此可怜，便命留下，“不许再闹！再闹，一定打了撵出去。”
paragraphs.english: Speaking, the little maid returned and said, "Pingle-er is busy with something. I asked what was it, and she told me. She said, 'send him out first, and tell Lintou-nurse to give her forty strokes at the corner door, and that is it.'" The old woman, upon hearing this, was so frightened that she could not even cry, and she implored the others, "I have been so lucky to be able to get in here! I am a widow, and have nothing but good intentions. I am devoted to serving the ladies. How can I possibly live now?" Xisi heard this and her heart softened again, so she said, "You're in no position to work here if you can't follow the rules, won't listen, and strike people. Where did you find such a disrespectful person? Every day you are quarreling, and that's only embarrassing you!" Qiongwen said, "Just ignore him! Send him away. There's no time for words and words." The old woman then implored all of them, "I was wrong, but the ladies have also told me that I can change, so you girls doing good by me and being kind to me is like doing something good for yourself, and doing a good deed!" She then begged Chunyan, "The whole reason for this was to punish you, but no one was punished. I'm the one who gets in trouble now. Good girl, please beg them!" Seeing how pitiful the old woman was, Yu'er ordered the others to leave her alone, saying, "Don't make a fuss! If you do, I'm going to kick you out."
paragraphs.chinese:
说着，只见那小丫头回来说：“平儿姑娘正在那里有事呢，问我干吗，我就说了。他说：‘先叫他出去，告诉林大娘，在角门上打四十板子就完了。’”那婆子听见这样说，吓得哭都哭不出来，央求袭人等人说：“好不容易才让我进来了！我是个寡妇，没别的坏心，一心在里头服侍姑娘们。我这回可怎么活啊！”袭人听了这话，心肠又软了，就说：“你既然想在这里做事，又不守规矩，又不听话，又打人，哪里找来这么个不懂事的？天天吵架，让别人笑话！”晴雯道：“理他呢！打发他出去算了。哪里有那么多时间，和他对嘴对舌的？”那婆子又央求众人道：“我虽然错了，可姑娘们也吩咐了我，以后改过，姑娘们那不是做好事，积德吗？”一面又央求春燕：“原是为打你才起的争执，结果没打成你，我却吃罪了。好孩子，你求求她们吧！”宝玉见这婆子可怜，就叫人留下，“不许再闹！再闹，一定要打你出去。”

(《红楼梦》第43回)

paragraphs.original: 那婆子一一谢过下去。只见平儿走来，问系何事。袭人等忙说：“已完了，不必再提了。”平儿笑道：“‘得饶人处且饶人’，得将就的就省些事罢。但只听见各屋里大小人等都作起反来了，一处不了又一处，叫我不知管那一处是！”袭人笑道：“我只说我们这里反了，原来还有几处！”平儿笑道：“这算什么事！这三四日的工夫，一共大小出了八九件呢，－－比这里的还大！可气，可笑！”袭人等听了诧异。
paragraphs.english: The maids all bowed their thanks. Then, she saw Ping'er approaching and asked what was happening. Li Xisen and the others quickly replied, "It's already over, there's no need to mention it again." Ping'er laughed, "It's best to be forgiving when you can. Just do what you can to simplify things. But when the people in the house rebel, it's a matter for all the rooms, and I can't manage everything." Li Xisen smiled and said, "I thought that our room was in trouble, but there are still other rooms!" Ping'er laughed, "That's nothing! In the last few days, there have been eight or nine major incidents. Some are even bigger than this one. It's outrageous and ridiculous!" Li Xisen and the others were surprised by what they heard.
paragraphs.chinese: 那些婆子都一一谢了下去。只见平儿过来了，问有什么事。袭人等人忙道：“已经完了，不必再提了。”平儿笑道：“‘得饶人处且饶人’，得将就的就省些事罢。但是屋里的人反了，这是各屋里的事，叫我管不了。”袭人笑道：“我还以为我们这里反了，原来还有几个地方！”平儿笑道：“这算什么事！这些天里，大大小小的出了八九件事了。比这里还大，可气，可笑！”袭人等人听了感到诧异。

paragraphs.original: 不知何事，下回分解。
paragraphs.english: I don't know the reason, I'll explain it next time.
paragraphs.chinese: 不知道是什么原因，下回再作解释。

title: 《柳叶渚边嗔莺叱燕　绛芸轩里召将飞符》
